Malleson wires 6th August, repeating Tehran : -"Following on arrival of Kazim Beg in Askabad there has been marked increase of Bolshevik cum Pan-Islam propaganda directed against British. Immediate object appears to be coercion of Persia into demanding withdrawal of British troops."
